Source.Name: gnome-app-list
Source.Summary: This project provides app recommendation data for the GNOME project
Source.Description: This project provides app recommendation data for the GNOME project, in the form of AppStream data which is installed in the standard system location. This is mainly used by the Software app.

Package.Name: gnome-app-list
Package.Summary: This project provides app recommendation data for the GNOME project
Package.Description: This project provides app recommendation data for the GNOME project, in the form of AppStream data which is installed in the standard system location. This is mainly used by the Software app.
